artist: Toyohara  Chikanobu Published by Fukuda Hatsujirō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: tan hardcover, accordion bound album with title down front center; album consists of one hexaptych and eleven triptychs of shogun and attendants engaging in various activities
marks: Signature, Titles, and Seals throughout Yo_shu_ Kunichika on each
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Public Appearances of Shōgun
